text: Treatment of stage 0 may be one of the following:          -  Mohs microsurgery.     -  Topical chemotherapy.     -  Topical biologic therapy with imiquimod.    -  Laser surgery.     -  Cryosurgery.         Check the list of NCI-supported cancer clinical trials that are now accepting patients with stage 0 penile cancer.
